Run Army Sister

Run Army Sister is a small blog that I worked on for one of my friend’s, wife.

I worked with Karen to design a blog with an Army feel. The purpose of this blog is to track and share Karen’s running experiences as well as raise money for the Wounded Warrior Project. The site also shows Karen’s progress towards her donation goals as well as upcoming races and results. The site responds well to any device and contains a photo gallery.

For this project I worked as the designer and developer. Wordpress proved to be the right tool for this site. It provided the functionality we needed to keep this site clean & simple.

Check out Run Army Sister
